column2: With a score of $SCORE$ you $FAILED$ beat House Kotromanic, House of Kotroman, they were powerfull nobles in the balkans reigning over Bosnia beginning in the mid 13th century. They would play a large role in Serbia and Hungary as they often married into the royal families of the afore mentioned. The Kotromanicians would continue to rule over Bosnia till the Ottoman Empire would conquer them in the late 16th and thereby ending Bosnia as we know it untill the modern day.
